newsitem.title: AUSTRIA: Austria's Auricon H1 net losses widen.
newsitem.headline: Austria's Auricon H1 net losses widen.

text.p: Austrian engineering holding group Auricon posted wider half-year net losses on Monday but said it expected a substantial improvement in full year earnings.
Auricon, whose shares slid 10 schillings to 300 in a sharply lower market, reported a group net loss of 134 million schillings compared to a loss of 126 million in the same period last year.
But sales rose to 1.99 billion schillings from 1.54 billion and the company forecast increased earnings at pre-tax level, paving the way for improved dividends.

Auricon reported a pre-tax profit of 74 million schillings in 1996 -- but plunged into the red after tax. Net losses came in at 51 million schillings and the total dividend was halved to 20 from 40 schillings. -- Vienna newsroom +431 531 12256
